snippet: The International Committee of the Red Cross said that two of its staff members were abducted by gunmen as they drove to work on Tuesday in Sana, Yemen’s capital.
abstract: Two International Committee of Red Cross staff members are abducted by gunmen in Sana, Yemen.
lead_paragraph: The International Committee of the Red Cross said that two of its staff members were abducted by gunmen as they drove to work on Tuesday in Sana, Yemen’s capital.

headline.main: Yemen: Red Cross Worker Is Held by Kidnappers
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Red Cross Worker Is Held by Kidnappers
